effect.short: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
effect.full: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.

flavorTexts.text:
The user boosts the power of the Electric move it
uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s
Sp. Def stat.
